
# 1) RLlib Independent PPO vs Baseline (single_intersection)
python .\debug_entry.py `
  --config-file environments/single_intersection/config.yaml `
  --hyperparams-file environments/single_intersection/hyperparams.yaml `
  --outdir .rllib_independent_ppo_test/single_intersection_constant_seed

# 2) Double Trouble: RLlib Independent PPO vs Baseline (double_intersection)
python .\debug_entry.py `
  --config-file environments/double_intersection/config.yaml `
  --hyperparams-file environments/double_intersection/hyperparams.yaml `
  --outdir .rllib_independent_ppo_test/double_trouble_flat_model_quick

# 3) Ingolstadt: RLlib Independent PPO vs Baseline
python .\debug_entry.py `
  --config-file environments/ingolstadt/config.yaml `
  --hyperparams-file environments/ingolstadt/hyperparams.yaml `
  --outdir .ingolstadt/constant_seed_GAT

python .\batch_eval.py `
  --config environments/ingolstadt/config.yaml `
  --outdir .grid-search-eval `
  --freeflow-speed-mps 13.89


# 4) Tuner: Single (PBT)
python .\utils\tune_pbt.py `
  --config environments/single_intersection/config.yaml `
  --hyper environments/single_intersection/hyperparams.yaml `
  --outdir .tuning/single_intersection_constant_seed

python .\tune_pbt.py `
  --config environments/ingolstadt/config.yaml `
  --hyper environments/ingolstadt/hyperparams.yaml `
  --outdir .ingolstadt/ingolstadt_pbt_random_seed


# 5) Eval Tuner: Single
python .\eval_run.py `
  --bundle-dir ".tuning/single_intersection_constant_seed/pbt_bundle" `
  --config environments/single_intersection/config.yaml `
  --outdir .tuning/single_intersection_constant_seed


Grid Search Tuner

python .\tuner.py `
  --config environments/ingolstadt/config.yaml `
  --hyper environments/ingolstadt/hyperparams.yaml `
  --outdir .tuner/ingolstadt_rough_sampled `
  --num-samples 32 `
  --max-concurrent 4 `
  --window-size 10 `
  --delta 0.01 `
  --patience 5 `
  --grace-period 15
